next_state: -= Kitchen =- You make another one of your grand eccentric entrances into a kitchen. You smell a hideous smell, and follow it to a fridge. The fridge contains a fried pork chop, a green bell pepper, a red onion and a cilantro. You see a closed oven right there by you. You can see a table. On the table you can make out a cookbook and a knife. You can't wait to tell the folks at home about this! Oh wow! Is that what I think it is? It is! It's a counter. You see a fried yellow potato, a yellow bell pepper, a raw red potato and a tomato on the counter. You hear a noise behind you and spin around, but you can't see anything other than a stove. The stove is conventional. But the thing is empty, unfortunately. Hopefully, this discovery doesn't ruin your TextWorld experience! There is an open plain door leading north.
